solution_line_template: 35% of the cookies have nuts and chocolate chips because {total_percent} - {nuts_fraction_percent} - {chocolate_chips_percent} = <<{total_percent}-{nuts_fraction_percent}-{chocolate_chips_percent}={nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent}>>{nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent}

60% of the cookies have nuts in them because {nuts_fraction_percent} + {nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent} = <<{nuts_fraction_percent}+{nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent}={total_nuts_percent}>>{total_nuts_percent}
She makes {cookies_with_nuts} cookies with nuts in them because {total_cookies} x {total_nuts_decimal} =<<{cookies_with_nuts}={cookies_with_nuts}>>{cookies_with_nuts}
